snippet.title: vridniX - Final trailer
snippet.description:
The new trailer of vridniX, the story-driven platformer where you'll destroy the world you wanna save!

The game will be released Q1 2018


You can get the demo here : http://vridnix.com
Follow us on the social media!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/vridnix/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/vridnix
